quotes: Mr. Moussa graduated in 1957 from the Faculty of Law, Cairo University
and joined the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Egypt in 1958.
the Egyptian Mission to the United Nations from 1958 to 1972.
He was appointed advisor to the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Egypt in 1974
served in that post until 1977
during the period 1977 to 1981
from 1981 to 1983.
In 1983 he was appointed Ambassador to India
where he served until 1986
until 1990
Mr. Moussa was appointed Minister of Foreign Affairs of Egypt from 1991 to 2001.
In May 2001 he was appointed as Secretary General of the League of Arab States.
In 2003 Mr. Moussa served as a member of the United Nations High Level Panel
the Grand Cordon of the Nile from the Egyptian government in May 2001
the Order of the Two Niles, first class, from Sudan in 2001
